name: Bingo Raider
description:
Welcome to Bingo Raider!
It's time for you to win big and compete with players from all over the globe. Strategy + Speed + Skill = Victory. Winning millions is no longer a fantasy!

Main Features:
-Free Bingo Games can be played at any time.
-Tremendous amount of tournaments, and enormous prize pools. All waiting for you.
-Fair competing environment. Compete against players with similar skill levels.
-Daily Bonuses and various Surprise Bonuses. Collect for free.

Why play other games when you can win some real cash?
Bingo Raider is very easy to play and has an outstanding visual style. Compete with others for the enormous prize pools! Believe you are the next big winner? Bingo Raider is waiting for you.
Victory depends on your strategy, memory, and reflexes. All three are vital to success.
What are you waiting for? Download now!
Notice: Cash Tournaments are unavailable in the following states: AZ、AR、IN、IA、LA、ME、MD、SC、MT and SD.
